question: An organization is receiving SPAM emails from a known malicious domain. What must be configured in order to prevent the session during the initial TCP

options.A: Configure the Cisco ESA to reset the TCP connection.
options.B: Configure policies to stop and reject communication.
options.C: Configure the Cisco ESA to drop the malicious emails.
options.D: Configure policies to quarantine malicious emails.

explanation: Configure the Cisco ESA to reset the TCP connection. best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: An organization received a large amount of SPAM messages over a short time period. In order to take action on the messages, it must be determined how harmful the messages are and this needs to happen dynamically. What must be

options.A: Configure the Cisco WSA to modify policies based on the traffic seen.
options.B: Configure the Cisco ESA to modify policies based on the traffic seen.
options.C: Configure the Cisco WSA to receive real-time updates from Cisco Talos.
options.D: Configure the Cisco ESA to receive real-time updates from Cisco Talos.

explanation: Configure the Cisco ESA to receive real-time updates from Cisco Talos. best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: What are two differences between a Cisco WSA that is running in transparent

options.A: The Cisco WSA responds with its own IP address only if it is running in explicit mode.
options.B: The Cisco WSA is configured in a web browser only if it is running in trans- parent mode.
options.C: The Cisco WSA responds with its own IP address only if it is running in transparent mode.
options.D: The Cisco WSA uses a Layer 3 device to redirect traffic only if it is running in transparent mode.
options.E: When the Cisco WSA is running in transparent mode, it uses the WSA’s own IP address as the HTTP request destination.

explanation: The Cisco WSA responds with its own IP address only if it is running in explicit mode.; The Cisco WSA uses a Layer 3 device to redirect traffic only if it is ru best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: 105 Which proxy mode must be used on Cisco WSA to redirect TCP traffic with
explanation: transparent best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: What is the purpose of the Decrypt for Application Detection fea-

options.A: It decrypts HTTPS application traffic for unauthenticated users.

options.C: The server team wants to outsource this service.

question: After a recent breach, an organization determined that phishing was used to gain initial access to the network before regaining persistence. explanation: Modify web proxy settings.. Phishing is best mitigated with  protection and strong  filtering controls.

question: An engineer has enabled LDAP accept queries on a listener. Malicious actors must be prevented from quickly identifying all valid recipients. What must be

options.B: Bypass LDAP access queries in the recipient access table.

question: In which two ways does a system administrator send web traffic transparently

options.B: configure AD Group Policies to push proxy settings
options.C: configure the proxy IP address in the web-browser settings
options.D: configure policy-based routing on the network infrastructure
options.E: reference a Proxy Auto Config file

explanation: use Web Cache Communication Protocol; configure policy-based routing on the network infrastructure best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: A Cisco ESA network administrator has been tasked to use a newly installed service to help create policy based on the reputation verdict. During testing, it is discovered that the Cisco ESA is not dropping files that have an undetermined

options.A: The policy was created to send a message to quarantine instead of drop.
options.B: The file has a reputation score that is below the threshold.
options.C: The file has a reputation score that is above the threshold.
options.D: The policy was created to disable file analysis.

explanation: The file has a reputation score that is below the threshold. best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: An organization has a Cisco ESA set up with DLP policies and would like to customize the action assigned for violations. The organization wants a copy of the message to be delivered with a message added to flag it as a DLP violation. Which actions must be performed in order to provide this capability?

options.B: quarantine and send a DLP violation notification
options.C: quarantine and alter the subject header with a DLP violation
options.D: deliver and send copies to other recipients

explanation: deliver and add disclaimer text best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: A Cisco ESA administrator has been tasked with configuring the Cisco ESA to ensure there are no viruses before quarantined emails are delivered. In addition, 112 delivery of mail from known bad mail servers must be prevented. Which two actions must be taken in order to meet these requirements?

options.A: Deploy the Cisco ESA in the DMZ.
options.E: Scan quarantined emails using AntiVirus signatures.

explanation: Use outbreak filters from SenderBase.; Scan quarantined emails using AntiVirus signatures. best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: An organization has noticed an increase in malicious content downloads and wants to use Cisco Umbrella to prevent this activity for suspicious domains while allowing normal web traffic. Which action will accomplish this task?
explanation: Configure the intelligent proxy. best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: Which attack is preventable by Cisco ESA but not by the Cisco WSA?
explanation: phishing best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: An organization recently installed a Cisco WSA and would like to take advan- tage of the AVC engine to allow the organization to create a policy to control application specific activity. After enabling the AVC engine, what must be done

options.A: Use security services to configure the traffic monitor.
options.B: Use URL categorization to prevent the application traffic.
options.C: Use an access policy group to configure application control settings.
options.D: Use web security reporting to validate engine functionality.

explanation: Use an access policy group to configure application control settings. best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: An administrator configures a Cisco WSA to receive redirected traffic over ports 80 and 443. The organization requires that a network device with specific WSA integration capabilities be configured to send the traffic to the WSA to proxy the requests and increase visibility, while making this invisible to the users. What must be done on the Cisco WSA to support these requirements?

options.A: Use PAC keys to allow only the required network devices to send the traffic to the Cisco WSA.
options.B: Configure transparent traffic redirection using WCCP in the Cisco WSA and on the network device.
options.C: Configure active traffic redirection using WPAD in the Cisco WSA and on the network device.
options.D: Use the Layer 4 setting in the Cisco WSA to receive explicit forward requests from the network device.

explanation: Configure transparent traffic redirection using WCCP in the Cisco WSA and on the network device. best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: A customer has various external HTTP resources available including Intranet, Extranet, and Internet, with a proxy configuration running in explicit mode. Which method allows the client desktop browsers to be configured to select
explanation: .PAC file best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: 120 Refer to the exhibit. How does Cisco Umbrella manage traffic that is directed

options.A: Traffic is managed by the application settings, unhandled and allowed.
options.B: Traffic is managed by the security settings and blocked.
options.C: Traffic is proxied through the intelligent proxy.

explanation: Traffic is proxied through the intelligent proxy. best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: An organization is implementing URL blocking using Cisco Umbrella. The users are able to go to some sites but other sites are not accessible due to an error.Why

options.A: Client computers do not have an SSL certificate deployed from an internal CA server.
options.B: Client computers do not have the Cisco Umbrella Root CA certificate in- stalled.
options.D: Intelligent proxy and SSL decryption is disabled in the policy.

explanation: Client computers do not have the Cisco Umbrella Root CA certificate in- stalled. best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: Which Cisco platform ensures that machines that connect to organizational net- works have the recommended antivirus definitions and patches to help prevent
explanation: Cisco ISE best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: What are two things to consider when using PAC files with the Cisco WSA?

options.A: If the WSA host port is changed, the default port redirects web traffic to the correct port automatically.
options.B: PAC files use if-else statements to determine whether to use a proxy or a direct connection for traffic between the PC and the host.
options.C: The WSA hosts PAC files on port 9001 by default.
options.D: The WSA hosts PAC files on port 6001 by default.
options.E: By default, they direct traffic through a proxy when the PC and the host are on the same subnet.

explanation: PAC files use if-else statements to determine whether to use a proxy or a direct connection for traffic between the PC and the host.; The WSA hosts PAC files on best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: An engineer enabled SSL decryption for Cisco Umbrella intelligent proxy and needs to ensure that traffic is inspected without alerting end-users. Which action

options.B: Modify the user’s browser settings to suppress errors from Cisco Umbrella.

question: 165 What is the purpose of joining Cisco WSAs to an appliance group?

explanation: two-interface best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: What are two ways a network administrator transparently identifies users using

options.A: Create an LDAP authentication realm and disable transparent user identifi- cation.
options.B: Create NTLM or Kerberos authentication realm and enable transparent user identification.
options.C: Deploy a separate Active Directory agent such as Cisco Context Directory Agent.
options.D: The eDirectory client must be installed on each client workstation.
options.E: Deploy a separate eDirectory server; the client IP address is recorded in this server.

explanation: Create NTLM or Kerberos authentication realm and enable transparent user identification.; Deploy a separate Active Directory agent such as Cisco Context Directo best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: 179 A network engineer must migrate a Cisco WSA virtual appliance from one physical host to another physical host by using VMware vMotion. What is a

options.A: The hosts must run Cisco AsyncOS 10.0 or greater.
options.B: The hosts must run different versions of Cisco AsyncOS.
options.C: The hosts must have access to the same defined network.
options.D: The hosts must use a different datastore than the virtual appliance.

explanation: The hosts must have access to the same defined network. best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: An engineer configures new features within the Cisco Umbrella dashboard and wants to identify and proxy traffic that is categorized as risky domains and may contain safe and malicious content. Which action accomplishes these objectives?

options.A: Upload the threat intelligence database to Cisco Umbrella for the most cur- rent information on reputations and to have the destination lists block them
options.B: Configure URL filtering within Cisco Umbrella to track the URLs and proxy the requests for those categories and below
options.C: Create a new site within Cisco Umbrella to block requests from those cate- gories so they can be sent to the proxy device
options.D: Configure intelligent proxy within Cisco Umbrella to intercept and proxy the requests for only those categories

explanation: Configure intelligent proxy within Cisco Umbrella to intercept and proxy the requests for only those categories best matches the requirement described in the question.

explanation: MX best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: How does a WCCP-configured router identify if the Cisco WSA is functional?

options.B: If an ICMP ping fails three consecutive times between a router and the WSA, traffic is no longer transmitted to the WSA.

options.D: The router sends a Here-I-Am message every 10 seconds, and the WSA acknowledges with an I-See-You message.

question: Refer to the exhibit. An engineer created a policy named usera1 on a Cisco Secure Email Gateway to enable the antispam feature for an email address of [email protected]. Which configuration step must be performed next to apply

question: Which Secure Email Gateway implementation method segregates inbound and

options.A: pair of logical listeners on a single physical interface with two unique logical IPv4 addresses and one IPv6 address
options.B: pair of logical IPv4 listeners and a pair of IPv6 listeners on two physically separate interfaces
options.C: one listener on one logical IPv4 address on a single logical interface
options.D: one listener on a single physical interface

explanation: pair of logical IPv4 listeners and a pair of IPv6 listeners on two physically separate interfaces best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: A network administrator received a critical message alert from a Cisco Secure Web Appliance stating that the log partition is at 107% capacity. How does a Cisco Secure Web Appliance respond when its logging partition is full?

options.A: It overwrites the oldest log files.
options.B: It suspends logging and reporting functions.
options.C: It deletes logs older than a configurable age.
options.D: It archives older logs in a compressed file to free space.

explanation: It suspends logging and reporting functions. best matches the requirement described in the question.

explanation: Decrypt Policies best matches the requirement described in the question.

explanation: Cisco Secure Email Outbound Essentials best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: What is a capability of Cisco Secure Email Cloud Gateway compared to Cisco

options.A: Secure Email Cloud Gateway is an add-on that is deployed to a web browser by using a group policy, and Secure Email Gateway requires a server infrastruc- ture.
options.B: Secure Email Cloud Gateway requires that a proxy be deployed to a web browser, and Secure Email Gateway requires a network reconfiguration.
options.C: Secure Email Cloud Gateway protects email without having to deploy an infrastructure, and Secure Email Gateway requires a server infrastructure.
options.D: Secure Email Cloud Gateway requires an ASA to redirect email by using WCCP, and Secure Email Gateway requires that the ASA be inline.

explanation: Secure Email Cloud Gateway protects email without having to deploy an infrastructure, and Secure Email Gateway requires a server infrastructure. best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: Refer to the exhibit. A company named ABC has a Cisco Secure Email Gate- way and an engineer must configure the incoming mail policy so that emails containing malware files are quarantined instead of dropped and to prevent an increase in false positives causing emails to be dropped erroneously. What must

options.D: Open usera1 policy, Messages with Malware Attachments, and then Action Applied to Message.

explanation: Open usera1 policy, Messages with Malware Attachments, and then Action Applied to Message. best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: 347 Refer to the exhibit. An engineer must forward all web traffic sent from Client- SiteA to the monitoring server to build a baseline of expected traffic once a new Cisco Secure Web Appliance is deployed. What must be configured on the
explanation: SPAN best matches the requirement described in the question.

question: The security team has installed a Cisco Secure Email Gateway. During setup, a large number of email messages containing the string “abcde1111111111” are being blocked. The security team wants to investigate and determine if the emails are part of a phishing or malware attack. Which configuration step must

options.A: Implement a policy to only allow email from trusted to the network senders.
options.B: Apply a policy to route all blocked emails to a separate quarantine folder.
options.C: Configure sender domain reputation policy to check if sender email domain is known to be malicious.
options.D: Configure a policy to disable spam filtering in order to expedite email delivery.

explanation: Apply a policy to route all blocked emails to a separate quarantine folder.. Phishing is best mitigated with  protection and strong  filtering controls.

question: Which two facts must be considered when deciding whether to deploy the Cisco Secure Web Appliance in Standard mode, Hybrid Web Security mode, or Cloud

options.A: External DLP is available only in Standard mode and Hybrid Web Security mode.
options.B: The onsite web proxy is not supported in Cloud Web Security Connector mode.
options.C: Standard mode and Hybrid Web Security mode perform the same actions in response to the application of an individual policy.
options.D: Only Standard mode and Hybrid Web Security mode support Layer 4 traffic monitoring.
options.E: ISE integration is available only in Standard mode and Hybrid Web Security mode.

explanation: The onsite web proxy is not supported in Cloud Web Security Connector mode.; Only Standard mode and Hybrid Web Security mode support Layer 4 traffic monitoring. best matches the requirement described in the question.
